hero.title: Find Your Balance: Comprehensive Yoga Course
hero.subtitle: Discover the harmony between body and mind through ancestral practices adapted to modern life.!

subtitle.p1: Our yoga course combines traditional techniques with modern approaches to provide you with a transformative experience. Whether you are a beginner or have experience, here you will find the path to improve your physical, mental, and emotional well-being.
subtitle.p2: If you're interested in connecting mind and body, learning postures and breathing techniques to reduce stress and enhance quality of life. This is your course!.

one.caption: Module 1
one.title: Yoga Fundamentals
one.description: We will discuss the history and origin of yoga to cover its basic and ethical principles.

two.caption: Module 2
two.title: Postures and Asanas
two.description: You will delve into postures for both beginners and advanced practitioners.

three.caption: Module 3
three.title: Breathing and Pranayama
three.description: You will learn breathing techniques for relaxation and energy.

four.caption: Module 4
four.title: Meditation and Mindfulness
four.description: We will practice exercises to integrate into your daily routine.

five.caption: Module 5
five.title: Yoga Lifestyle and Philosophy
five.description: You will discover strategies to incorporate yoga into your daily routine.

six.caption: Module 5
six.title: Conscious Eating
six.description: This way of eating not only promotes better digestion and nutrition, but also fosters a deeper connection with your body and surroundings, enhancing overall well-being.

one.caption: NEWSLETTER
one.title: Everything about YOGA
one.description: Subscribe to our newsletter to receive promotions and updates about YOGA.

two.caption: 1-YEAR COURSE
two.title: Change Your Lifestyle
two.description: Beyond postures, this course invites you to reconnect with yourself, reducing stress, improving flexibility, and cultivating a serene mind.

three.caption: INDIVIDUAL COACHING
three.title: Do You Want Us to Help You?
three.description: Contact us for more personalized assistance.

one.title: Do I Need Previous Experience?
one.description: No, the course is designed to suit both beginners and advanced practitioners.

two.title: What Equipment Do I Need?
two.description: All you need is a yoga mat, comfortable clothing, and the desire to learn.

three.title: Do I Need to Know How to Code for the Course?
three.description: It is not necessary. We will start from scratch when teaching how to transform and deploy our Design Tokens, so you won't have any issues following the classes even if you have never coded.

four.title: Do I Need to Know How to Code for the Course?
four.description: It is not necessary. We will start from scratch when teaching how to transform and deploy our Design Tokens, so you won't have any issues following the classes even if you have never coded.

five.title: How Are the Classes Delivered?
five.description: We offer live classes, on-demand videos, and personalized coaching.

six.title: Will I Have Access to the Content After the Course?
six.description: Yes, you will have access to the platform with the session resources and recordings.
